issues.title: Gift Membership Code email missing codes
issues.body:
Payment completes.  I get the Gift Membership code email, but with no codes.  Codes are also missing from contribution record and confirmation screen.  

Nothing in logs.

For the purchase priceset, I've tried checking "Membership" and also "Contribution" for the "used for" field.

When I create a priceset field and give it the type "purchase gift membership", choose membership type, save the field, then view the priceset fields, the field type now is shown as "Text / Numeric Quantity".  Is that expected?

I'm using Civicrm 4.6.26

issues.title: CiviCRM 4.7
issues.body: Are there any plans to have this working under 4.7?

issues.title: Error at checkout:   Please select at least one membership option.
issues.body:
A new price set was created for purchasing gift memberships, using two membership levels. A new contribution page was set up using this price set.  Purchase is not possible because of this error:  

Please correct the following errors in the form fields below:
Please select at least one membership option.

There's nothing to select, other than the units of gift membership.  Is there possibly something missing from the UI? 

![screen shot 2016-01-09 at 3 20 05 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5252344/12218148/9c73b5e4-b6e4-11e5-92e5-ecf62d98232e.png)

issues.title: Allow gift membership email to be easily edited
issues.body:
From what I can tell, the only way to edit the email containing the gift codes is to edit the extension directly. (i.e. file giftmemberships.php circa line 192). 

It would be best if there was a better way to allow users to edit this email directly. Ideally using the civimail templates interface.

issues.title: Gift membership is not an integer field, hence allows for 1.5
issues.body: Seems likely that this was intended to only allow for integers. Currently I am able to enter 1.5 and be charged 1.5 x price, and get two tokens.

commits.message:
Merge pull request #3 from xurizaemon/format-cleanup

PSR-2ish cleanup

Merge pull request #1 from xurizaemon/xurizaemon-patch-3

Update info.xml: version & compatibility
Fixes Validation Error When Redeeming Membership
fix notice on thank you page

issue_comments.body: I am working on an upgrade now, perhaps ready in the next 2 weeks or so

commits.message: PSR-2, mostly - did not touch overlong lines or opening braces.

pull_requests.title: Provide Entity / Drupal Views support
pull_requests.body:
We wanted to build a Drupal View of the gift membership codes (to see which codes had not yet been claimed).

This is some initial work which exposes Gift Membership Codes when in combination with CiviCRM Entity module.
#3 precedes this, so please review and merge that first, which will make this a smaller change.

pull_requests.title: No Gift Memberships still sends email
pull_requests.body: This is a check to make sure there's actually a value set in the form before creating the codes and preparing the email.  With no value set, the email will still be sent but no codes are listed.

issue_comments.body: You are using a membership setting and a price set within that. Disable it. Use a price set under Amounts tab. See attached snapshot. I ran into a similar issue as yours and decided to try my approach. It worked.
Has anyone successfully got this working in 4.7 or are there any plans to upgrade?
